data.meta_description: Mayank Anand is an Indian actor, artist, author and director. He is best known for playing the character of Dr. Rahul on the television series Dill Mill Gayye. Mayank's most popular role to date was Dr. Rahul Garewal in Dill Mill Gayye on STAR One in which he acted opposite Drashti Dhami. He also pe
data.text:
Career

Mayank's most popular role to date was Dr. Rahul Garewal in Dill Mill Gayye on STAR One in which he acted opposite Drashti Dhami. He also performed as a VJ on the music show Cinesong on Zee Music.

He married Shraddha Nigam in January 2013. They have since launched a fashion label together at the Lakme Fashion Week.
